column5: And a big thank you from my family and I. North shore lake Erie, Leamington Ontario.
No country in the world had a better neighbor, friend, and ally than we do in Canada. Thank you!
X2. And to u guys comin up for holidays .hope u guys have a great trip and enjoy our country like we do
To our great neighbors to the north.HAPPY CANADA DAY
Canada, we wish you the best.
Happy Canada Day! Have a good one. Later, Jay
Have a Happy Canada Day eh!
Most definitely I hope ALL you Canuks have a great day.
I miss the days in camp when I was in Canada for the 1st. Have a good one today neighbors
Happy Day to my close neighbors to the north and thanks for allowing us to fish your great lakes!!
On behalf of Canada and all Canadians, thank you!
